In July 2009, Donald Rumsfeld of State Hillary Clinton explicitly admitted this: We want Iran to calculate what I think is a fair assessment that if the United States extends a defense umbrella over the region, if we do even more to support the military capacity of those in the Gulf, it's unlikely that Iran will be any stronger or safer because they won't be able to intimidate and dominate as they apparently believe they can once they have a nuclear weapon.[ 20] A policy of containment thus implies that the U.S. will expand its military presence in the Persian Gulf.
